DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center , multi-regional observational,24 month study . Health-related quality life data MusiQoL instrument SF-36 instrument collect baseline , M6 , M12 , M18 M24 patient MS . In addition , physical health outcome expand disability status score ( EDSS ) collect every 6 month .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient form MS ( confirm McDonald and/or Poser criterion ) 2 . Patient 18 year old ( inclusive , time informed consent ) . 3 . Patient EDSS score low 7.0 ( inclusive , time informed consent ) 4 . Patient without treatment 5 . Patient read , understood , sign date informed consent form 6 .
